title: Command Injection
description: The code does not sanitize user input before executing commands, which could lead to command injection.
fix: Sanitize and validate all user inputs before using them in system calls or shell commands.

reasoning.pattern: The code does not show any input validation or sanitization for the commands being executed. This is a common pattern where attackers can inject malicious commands into the application.
reasoning.exploit_example: An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by injecting a command such as `; rm -rf /` into an input field that is used to execute shell commands, potentially leading to complete system compromise.
